author: joyce
msg: Resolves CLIMATE-60 - Add and wire-in SettingsCtrl.
- Changes the formatting for the evaluationSettings object for easier
- Adds SettingsCtrl that binds a local variable to the evaluation
- Updates settings modal in index.html to display the metrics.

author: joyce
msg: Resolves CLIMATE-59 - Add modal for evaluation settings.
- Adds the skeleton for the evaluation settings modal to index.html.
- Adds a "Settings" button for opening the settings modal.

author: joyce
msg: Resolved CLIMATE-58. Fixes boostrapModalOpen attribute handling.
- Adds conversion from string to boolean in the assignment of of the
background and keyboard attributes. This causes the correct boolean
value to be passed to the corresponding open function.

author: joyce
msg: Resolves CLIMATE-57 - Add service for evaluation settings
